nodes.bodyText: oh good. I had missed this in my version. you win!
increase isn't the right word here. I would say "absolute measures can only record positive values"
monotonicity isn't the right word. should be "absolute"
since this is a little-b boolean, let's rename this to isAbsolute()
ugh. they should both be changed. :)
I would keep the renaming out of this PR and open an issue to do not forget it ;)
I'm fine with that, as well.
ok, create this issue, and this PR should be good to merge, IMO
